title: BYREDO PARFUMS TYPEFACE?
content:
Looks like a combination of Sackers / Engravers' Gothic & Futura

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Byredo-Parfums.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150325212530/http:/typophile.com/files/Byredo-Parfums.jpg) | 79.16 KB |
| [byredo-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150325212530/http:/typophile.com/files/byredo-1.jpg) | 15.7 KB |
| [Picture 34.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150325212530/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2034.png) | 14.54 KB |
author: James Trump

comments.content: It is exactly that– an amalgamation. I think there is also Neutraface 2.0 and the capital C is from Chalet.

BTW... this is very beautiful, I see why you like it.

:-) Mikey

Thank you. Do you think someone constructed the font using letters from different fonts and assembled them using a font creation software?

I'm putting together an ID for a client and think it would be perfect for there headline font. The thought of having to construct it every time from different fonts sounds to time consuming.

Thank you. Do you think someone constructed the font using letters from different fonts and assembled them using a font creation software?

I'm putting together an ID for a client and think it would be perfect for there headline font. The thought of having to construct it every time from different fonts sounds too time consuming though.

Gypsy water? for people who want to smell like a gypsy? Not that I'm saying..etc.

It takes all sorts I suppose.

Nick Cooke

Haha, Gypsy water, I didn't give it a thought.

It proves with the right typeface you can get away with calling it anything...

... Eau de homeless person is the next to be launched... any takers?

James, if they didn’t use font making software they surely did a fabulous job in Illustrator!

You can do it though!
I've just discovered it was designed by Acne Art Department. Any new info on the Byredo Parfums typeface would still be great.

Did some research and found that its custom by Moses Voigt of Acne Art Department ( [http://www.acneartdepartment.se/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150325212530/http:/www.acneartdepartment.se/ "http://www.acneartdepartment.se/"))

Type Specimen here:  
 [http://www.behance.net/gallery/Byredo-Parfums/1109049](http://web.archive.org/web/20150325212530/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Byredo-Parfums/1109049 "http://www.behance.net/gallery/Byredo-Parfums/1109049")

It's really nice.
